entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
